long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool simplifies the ability too generate passwords on the fly! Crafted using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, it offers users unparalleled control over their password creation process. With customizable options for password length and a selection of six different password types, users can effortlessly generate highly secure passwords tailored to their specific needs. This extension redefines convenience and security in password management for Chrome users. No Saving Passwords, No BS, Just pure generations.
